topics.body: So how was everyone else's day?
topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559f041c636872440e000404#post_559f041c636872440e000404
[bq="Too_Offensive"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559f037963687254ea0002c7#post_559f037963687254ea0002c7
I swear to fucking god if the end of the world is a boring ass economical apocalypse I am going to be so pissed[/bq]
A better analogy would be imagine the EU as a house that a lot of people live in.  The situation in greece is like someone lighting the curtains on fire.  The problem is that they're trying to put it out with a spray bottle.

"HOLY SHIT!  The curtains are on fire!  Use the fire extinguisher!"
"No no; don't use the fire extinguisher!  Use this spray bottle!"
"How is that supposed to help?!"


What is probably going to happen?  The euro is probably going to start losing value and the EU is going to continue believing everything is fine.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
!https://38.media.tumblr.com/d8587fd9fd814e2340db189cf0c00581/tumblr_nhkj67VGqo1qbq5g5o1_500.gif!
I blame Joel for this.

The Gashadokuro is a Yokai that's a Skeleton 15 times larger than a Human's. It's made up of the skeletons of improperly buried corpses. It bites the heads off of lone travelers out after midnight. Victims hear a ringing noise before they appear.
